author: AccessWDUN Staff
title: Buford routs Chestatee in 8-AAAA action
text:
Saturday October 3rd, 2015 9:10AM 6:10AM ( 1 day ago ) Weather Alert Posted 7:00AM on Saturday 3rd October 2015 ( 2 hours ago ) Buford routs Chestatee in 8-AAAA action By AccessWDUN Staff Related Articles 2015 High school football rankings 2015 High School Football region standings WEEK 6: Playoff, region races shaping up after big night VIDEO: Gainesville makes most of six Salem turnovers to set up Lanier showdown 
BUFORD -- Buford held Chestatee to just 7 total yards in the first half en route to a 56-0 win in Region 8-AAAA action Friday night at Tom Riden Stadium. 
While the defense was putting the clamps on the War Eagles, the Buford offense churned up 328 total yards, including 216 on the ground. 
Christian Turner and Martin Mangram each had a pair of rushing touchdowns and Joshua Blackwell had one rushing touchdown and a 47-yard punt return, all in the first half. Turner scored on runs of 35- and 47-yards and Mangram added 4- and 36-yard scoring runs. 
Quarterback Mic Roof was 4-of-5 passing for 112 yards, including a 14-yard touchdown pass to Brandon Marsh. 
Anthony Grant added a 5-yard touchdown run as the Wolves (4-1, 2-0 Region 8-AAAA) led 56-0 at halftime. Buford will travel to The Brickyard next week to take on a resurgent North Hall squad. 
Chestatee (0-5, 0-2) will play host to Madison County next week still looking for its first win of the season. Associated Categories : Sports , High School Sports , Friday Game Night Associated Tags : High school football, Buford football Â© Copyright 2015 AccessWDUN.com
